website_summaries.verdict: A great multipurpose bag that functions as carry-on, book bag, or backpack. Stable and maneuverable. Its greatest strength is roominess.
pros: Hidden shoulder straps convert this wheeled carry-on to a backpack
cons: Some users say telescopic arm can fail unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: So worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a backpack for your middle schooler? THIS IS IT My daughter had so many books she was lugging back and forth, that we decided this was the answer. Yes, it's pricey, but well worth the investment...this will get her through middle school and probably high school as well. Highly recommend if you're a parent that likes organization and practicality 😉
customer_reviews.author: Marchese Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for school or as carry-on luggage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this backpack for about 2 months now and I love it. I have a bad back and this makes carrying my nursing textbooks so much easier. Plenty of smaller storage compartments. Easily holds several very large binders, plus my laptop & charger. Glides smoothly, sturdy framework, straps easy to use. Haven’t had any issues with it tipping over when it’s full. I also use this bag as a carry-on when I fly. It can bulge out pretty far when it’s packed full, but I’ve always been able to fit it in an overhead bin.
customer_reviews.author: Bexar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of jansport, it has always been my preferred brand of back pack since 93'. The pack is from heavy and not the typical jansport quality. It keeps flipping over and the wheels are loud. The sleeve for the laptop is in the middle of the pack. I have a 15 inch mac and the bag saga down and the front of the bag hang over the bottom. The mac swings back and forth unstable if you don't have anything in the bag to support it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rinnie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is in the 6th grade and attends a school that requires him to bring all of his books to and from school. This is the best backpack I have found for transporting all of his books, lunchbox, water bottle, etc...It carries his large Math, Science and Language Arts Books, along with many other books and workbooks, notebooks, etc... The backpack has zippers that are not cheap and it stands up even with all of the items my son carries. It looks nice and rolls well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gabbywise

customer_reviews.title: Works, but it's bulky and LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Got this when my wrists and arms hurt too much to carry my backpack to school. It did an excellent job not tipping over (much) on a long walk to campus on pretty uneven terrain, and the handle is super easy to grip. It's pretty bulky, but not heavy, just bulkier than expected. The only real drawback is that the wheels are SUPER loud on hard floors, but especially asphalt/concrete. I definitely confused a fair share of people I'm walking behind with the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Rylie Michelle

customer_reviews.title: 2 days after return window, strap broke
customer_reviews.text: it seemed awesome. but the strap broke 32 days after purchase. it rolled well, held more books than the big student backpack. Update: i sent it off to be repaired directly with jansport. paid the fees, got it back and not even 3 weeks later SAME issue. MAJOR DESIGN FLAW. i do NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: hf2272

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm so frustrated. The handle won't pull up after just 2 months of using it. My husband tried to fix it for hours and best he could do was add a new handle (see photo). 6th grader super embarassed but it cost over $100. If I could get a replacement I would but I don't know how!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E Goodhue

customer_reviews.title: Not good features- regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: the handle is very short, and where you put the water bottle on the side of the bag is very wide and the waterbottles fall out, does not matter how wide the bottle is , if the bag tilts the waterbottles fall out and the handle is so short.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: High quality roller backpack
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is more expensive than my luggage! BUT I have to say it's quality is great. I hope it lasts at least for 2 yrs or so.... since my son is only in 6th grade. This year with the virus, school doesn't allow kids to use their lockers. He hurt his back for wearing a 100 lbs backpack on his shoulder for 8 hours long. My son LOVES LOVES IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This rolling backpack has been a life saver for my son this year. This is his first year of middle school and we had two backpacks because they have a rotating A and B day schedule. They were a pain to carry and my son was lugging around so many books. We switched to this mid year and he is able to roll all his books (no more using two backpacks) easily. It’s a little pricey but so worth it because it takes a beating from my son. Barely any signs of wear after months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Tara T

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy rolling pack
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter to use for school because she has to cart things to and from school and she had dislocated her shoulder during swimming. Even had she not I think this is a better approach to carting a bunch of heavy things around day in and out. It’s a very spacious bag, rolls well, can be warn as a backpack (but why?) and I’d imagine it would make a descent small carry on for a day tripper. It doesn’t rain much here but she’s had no trouble with the contents of her bag getting wet when it has.
customer_reviews.author: GRR

customer_reviews.title: Jansport makes the best backpacks! I bought this for my 10 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Jansport makes the best backpacks! I bought this for my 10 year old son. Even though his school has a rule against rolling backpacks, the weight of books and binders in a backpack on a 4'6" 55 pound kid was too much. He's super strong, but super thin and he was walking bent over from the weight of the backpack. He just isn't heavy enough to counterbalance a loaded backpack. We told his teachers this and didn't have any problem from the school. His last backpack was also Jansport and still looks brand new. I had Jansport backpacks in college. Their lifetime warranty is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the high price.
customer_reviews.text: My tween is the only kid at her middle school given a medical exemption to use a rolling backpack due to back pain. As a very short but strong 12 year old, she has been able to navigate with great ease in her fairly large school, even up and down stairs in the 3 floor building, as well as outside of school across stereotypical bumpy city sidewalks. Handle is low for most adults to use however with full comfort. Quality is Jansport strong. Worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Mandal-Mandal

customer_reviews.title: Only retracts 1 level ?
customer_reviews.text: My handle does not retrack to 2 stages. Its either all the way down or to the highest possible height. I thought there was suppose to be able to retract to 2 differnt heights..Kinda bumped because I use it for my 6 year old for the distance learning since she has to bring so many things to daycare and I feel the handle is quite long . Would prefer for it to have 2 levels of retraction.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son used for 2.5 weeks and one of the shoulder straps tore off. The straps get caught in the wheels if you’re not careful. If your kid will pay close attention to the straps and is careful with belongings it might work for you. Also, the frame is pretty heavy and sturdy, which makes it very heavy with books...it’s fine on flat surfaces and rolls well, but if you have to carry up stairs or maneuver it in & out of the car it can be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney B.

customer_reviews.title: No lockers at school this year, no problem wheel everything with you in this backpack.
customer_reviews.text: With school precautions to prevent the spread of Covid. My daughter was carrying way to much in her backpack at the beginning of the school year and causing her back pain. Purchased this Jansport backpack on wheels. She can fit everything she needs to carry around and more with no additional strain on her back. This was perfect for the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sims

customer_reviews.title: Nice rolling backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love all JanSport products. I have never had an issue with any of their backpacks. This backpack has plenty of storage space which is great! Very roomy! I can’t say how durable this one is as I’ve only owned it for a month. I haven’t used it in rain yet so can speak to it’s water resistance capabilities. One thing I wished this backpack had is a sturdier handle. It feels very flimsy and I’m scared it may not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: large, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is huge! It's very nice quality with smooth zippers. Handle works fine. I've read some reviews of issues with the handle... I'll update my review if we run into that. If I would've known about this backpack before spending way too much on carryon suitcases for my kids, I would've skipped the carryon suitcases and bought these instead.
customer_reviews.author: MVETW

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Rolling Spacious Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Our middle school students don’t have lockers and must carry everything with them all day. This backpack holds gym clothes, books, computer, and even a clarinet, along with the expected pencils, papers, etc. Based on other reviews we were prepared to swap out the wheels for more quiet ones, but as it turns out they’re not so loud as to require that alteration. Also, rain has not been a problem making the contents damp. Definitely water resistant. Very happy with the product and will likely buy another one when our younger child reaches middle school.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nursing School Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases I made for nursing school. I often have books for multiple classes along with my laptop and lunch. My back has been saved from the lack of lugging, and several of my classmates have made the switch. It is totally worth the cost. I would buy another one in a heartbeat, but I won't need to, because this one has held up masterfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse & Flanny

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Like many people, my ageing back suggested that I get some wheels for my daily burden. This is much better than I expected. More emphasis should be put on all of the pockets. It has sturdier wheels than many are saying. If you shop around you can get a bargain. I got a navy bag. Great color. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jiggs

customer_reviews.title: Where are the shoulder straps?
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed. The shoulder straps are cheep. I had to move from a Swiss Gear book bag to one with wheels due to a back injury. This bag feels so cheap compared to my previous one. The straps are poor. The material is flimsy. I expected more for the price. I will give the bag a plus for being able to stand on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Falls forward
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is really solid but when it's full it tips forward. Annoying when you need to set it aside and step away for a minute. I'm sure you could balance by just using the back compartment, but that means you can't use the front three compartments. That makes no sense. Otherwise, there's a lot of space and the bag seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: FutureMrsBLW

customer_reviews.title: I'm not disappointed. Love this thing and the telescoping handle is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a clinical instructor with the U of U Nursing College and haul lots of stuff to the hospital for clinicals and roll around the whole hospital checking on students. I knew I could count on Jansport because of its stellar reputation. I'm not disappointed. Love this thing and the telescoping handle is smooth and has been working beautifully now for months. It's a well constructed solid backpack on wheels. The wheels are smooth and a bit noisier than I'd like but then again when you're walking down a long corridor in an old hospital at 5 a.m. and no one is around ANYTHING will sound noisy!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Got this for my 10 year old who will be doing distance learning all year. But has to go to the grandparents with her crazy amount of books. Holds everything nicely. Wheels are amazing. Nice and wide. Smooth. Handle slides up and down like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected. Very nice bag. My son loves it. He can’t seem to not carry all his books in his bag when he doesn’t need to, so carrying a book bag on his back was hurting his back, so he asked for a bag he can pull. He hasn’t used it yet as we just got it, but Jansport is a good brand, so I have faith that it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dilly

customer_reviews.title: Great for Middle School
customer_reviews.text: My kid's in Middle School. I don't remember having so many books and notebooks for school when I was a kid. But my kid has a ton of papers, books, and also carries a laptop. This saves his back. If you value your kid's back, this this rolling back. It also comes with backpack straps in case the kids wants to strap it to the back. Very sturdy, made well. Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Jim_From_NY

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I am a university student and this backpack fits everything I need to take to school. From books to notebooks, gym outfit, water bottle, makeup. It pretty much has a compartment to store anything you need. It can be heavy and bulky, but it rolls great on smooth or rougher floors/concrete. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great for Middle School!
customer_reviews.text: Since lockers are not allowed during COVID we had to find something for my 6th grader that could handle all of his books and notebooks. This backpack is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: This is a game changer folks.
customer_reviews.text: My son is legally blind so his books and other supplies are large and bulky. He also has to use a cane. This book bag on wheels was a game changer for him. It takes weight off his shoulders and makes it easier for him to navigate. Also it holds so much and the durability so far is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer LaFratta

customer_reviews.title: Tipping Over Issue, Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The color is not the same color as advertised. The bag when full tips over very easily. I think it is a design issue with the front wheels. I returned the bag because it tipped over when loaded with just gym stuff. I couldn't keep it from tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack for my son. It seems very sturdy and rolls well. It's pretty large - larger than a standard backpack. It's also kinda heavy when empty. It was heavier than I expected, but we kept it since it seems very well made and sturdy. My son has been using it for a month and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tins

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Spacious, JanSport Lifetime Guarantee
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this backpack. He's gone through so many different backpacks...they always break. This backpack seems durable and has plenty of space. He's in the 7th grade and carries so many things around, I thought a rolling backpack would save his back. I'm very happy with this purchase. JanSport also a lifetime guarantee on all their backpacks. They will repair or replace their backpacks. So awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mar007

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have not taken it out of the house yet. (Pandemic and such.) But, I already love it. It has so much room. It expands to hold a lot more than an average backpack. Handle is easy to let up and down. Great quality. Wish I had bought another when it was on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Pathfinderjd

customer_reviews.title: grand son loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: yes a happy grand son. this bag is strong made well the wheels are perfect the size amazing for all the book and stuff kids carry these days. the mini computer fits well and safe as well. bought other bags before but find these company to have the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I had a Jansport all through college and graduate school. The quality is unmatched by anything else out there in the market. I got this one for my son and after seeing how wonderful it is, I ordered one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee Michaels

customer_reviews.title: It's very large!
customer_reviews.text: Rolls very nicely. It's a little larger than I expected, and sometimes hard to roll through busy hallways at my college. Feel like it's always in the way, especially in the elevator, BUT it holds all my books, lunch, small purse, etc. The only thing I would change is the computer sleeve...it's in the front and makes my laptop lean forward, which then leans all my books forward awkwardly. They should have designed the backpack with computer sleeve in the back, so it would not be front heavy. Overall, it's a well made, large rolling backpack. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi I.

customer_reviews.title: Never Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the backpack! JanSport has always been thee brand for me during school and now as a nursing major I'm glad I made the decision again to purchase the wheeled backpack. There are plenty of handy pockets. I just wish there was a strap to condense the backpack if the extra room wasn't needed yet but that extra room doesn't affect the function of the backpack. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: TouXiong

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a backpack. Even though for elementary school age books are starting to pile up. Just make for the heavy backpack to carry on the shoulders so love the Wheeling option. Still plenty of room in there too
customer_reviews.author: luv to shop

customer_reviews.title: It rolls smoothly.  The handle goes up and down easily.
customer_reviews.text: It's not balanced properly. It tends to tip over when filling it. It's much smaller than I expected it to be. The zipper for main part doesn't zip far enough down to fill easily. The backpack needs to be a little bigger for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S.

customer_reviews.title: much better made for half the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6th grade grandson to use instead of his much less expensive, much better made for half the price, backpack. The handle is not sturdy, the fabric is sub par on the exterior and a joke on the inside. The "padded" laptop section rests against the handle bar with no padding!!! I would like to know if this is an actual jansport product or a knock off?? Made in Vietnam and very very poor quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Big bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the silent wheels and the material. Needs more secure compartments (like in Swissgear) or heftier zippers, easy to get into and close: the lip over cover can get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Genaro

customer_reviews.title: Not for school purposes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bad for college purpose because I was tired carrying heavy backpack. I was hyped about this bag for months. I finally got the money to buy it and when it arrived I was excited. Wore it school the next day and couldn’t keep it on my back for 1min. The tires makes it twice heavy than your regular load, and unbearable to put on your back. It’s only for rolling . I thought it was a multipurpose-backpack. Good for traveling definitely not school. Still don’t know how long it will last
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Banks

customer_reviews.title: Still works great two years later
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bag for two years. I initially bought it for my last year of college while I was also pregnant. It was awesome not to have to carry my huge books in a backpack. It is so durable and rolls around great. It also hold a lot which I find to be a plus. I now use it for travel for my son's clothes, but I am willing to bet it will last a long while and I may pass it on to another student. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amymarie483

customer_reviews.title: Nursing School Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to do it. I hated the idea of being the old lady on campus with a wheelie backpack BUT the textbooks required for nursing school are gigantic and heavy. And if parking at your school is anything like parking at my school, it isn't exactly convenient to run back and forth to your car to exchange textbooks. This backpack carries it all and it wheels easily. I don't really have any complaints. It has held up for 2 hard semesters. I carry my 15" macbook pro, chargers, a bag of pens and highlighters, my wallet, books and binders and a full size planner. Everything fits.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey the Great

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursing school!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom going back to school for nursing. She went to school on a campus that was super hilly - this tolerated being pulled across campus in the summer and winter. Being in nursing - there were tons of books - and BIG books - this held up very nicely. It held all of her books, some bottles of water, her notebook computer, and other misc things very well! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this backpack for school, he has been using it for about a semester and it is holding up very well, much better than other backpacks he’s used. Most start falling apart within a month. He carries 40+ pounds of books in it every day and hasn’t had any problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: hd-rydr

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves this backpack. He is hard on everything, but this has survived pretty well throughout the school year. It is a little to heavy for a regular, everyday use bag. It is not comfortable on your back, especially with text books and other heavy items in it. If you use it as a suit case, and pull it behind you it works well, at that point you should just get a suit case with wheels that turn and rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Sales and Marketing Items
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for a friend who does Healthcare Sales, she was caring a heavy backpack. This is amazing, if holds her marketing items and her electronics. Thinking of one for me! A great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Van Orman

customer_reviews.title: Nothing missing from this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Huge sturdy backpack with all the features you would want. Bought for my 13 year old for travel. If you stuff it full it will not fit under a seat or in overhead bin so need to be mindful of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kkalarnystone

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This rolling backpack is so well made. I purchased it for my granddaughter who is in 7th grade. She loves it. Her friends that were carrying backpack that weighs 40 lbs all have purchased rolling backpack. Great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Oliver

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks into the school year this backpack is doing exactly what it said it would. Easy to clean, spacious, the straps even hold up to a lot of weight. My only drawback is the ability to flip over when running to catch the bus, etc. My daughters are enjoying the ease of transporting their things to and fro, so I’m a happy momma.
customer_reviews.author: Kia T

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my son’s school backpack so he could wheel instead of carry it. It ripped after 2 weeks of light/normal use.
customer_reviews.author: LetsHealTheEarth

customer_reviews.title: Rolli
customer_reviews.text: Use this bag on a daily basis for work. I carry quite a bit of stuff in it. It is larger than most rolling backpacks. It has been excellent so far.
customer_reviews.author: DKM

customer_reviews.title: Beware the Straps!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, big bag. Biggest complaint is the straps, which drag on the ground. Removable would be great. Or some way to make sure they don't drag on the ground. Straps are torn up and useless after one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after 6 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. All the great reviews made me think this would be a great product but the handle won't stay up now, 7 weeks into my son's school year. And because I bought it a few weeks before school started I can't return it through amazon. Not fun.
customer_reviews.author: Monteur

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Jansport has always been a durable brand that lasts! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Candice B

customer_reviews.title: Week handle, bag is too heavy even empty.
customer_reviews.text: Handle is already broken. Mind you my child was off for three weeks in December. We got the bag late October, used it for about 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: katee afshar

customer_reviews.title: Is the only one of its kind that delivers on so many fronts: light, portable (on your back or rolling) and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used a version of this bag since 2002. During that time I have had 2 of them and I have just now had to purchase a third. I think that is pretty good durability and reliability. To this day it is the only one of its kind that delivers on so many fronts: light, portable (on your back or rolling) and easy to use (essential for women with less upper arm strength to negotiate stairs sometimes when travelling). I am travelling almost weekly and it really holds up. I wish it were more sophisticated looking but you can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not small imperfection!
customer_reviews.text: It was in bad shape! It said there was a small imperfection and this was far from small imperfect. Very disappointed. There was gum on the wheel and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: leticia santana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for students
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our child to use at High School. It’s very durable and stores so much! Excellent build quality. Absolutely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I pack this bag down and it holds allot. Seems durable and rolls very smooth. Will update this review if it does not hold up to its name.
customer_reviews.author: J_Money

customer_reviews.title: I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This bag pack barely lasted two weeks. The metal hanger part broke... total waste of money... I expected more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lots of room different sections for books or a laptop pens lunch water bottle whatever you want wheels are smooth easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Stewart

customer_reviews.title: all wheel drive!
customer_reviews.text: I broke a wheel when i jammed my previous wheeled back pack into my car. The backpack has served me well for 2 years of my doctoral program. I searched for replacements and found good reviews for this Jansport. It will serve the purpose for the last year of my program but am disappointed in the laptop compartment. I can't fit my laptop in the correct compartment and ONLY that compartment is padded. So I don't feel my computer is nearly as protected. I have a padded case I use with the backpack and think that will help. otherwise the wheels seem sturdy and the bag seems like it will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but poor quality and has come apart at a seam after 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware before you drop $90 on this backpack. It seems nice and like it is durable. Lots of compartments and feels solid. But after 6 weeks it has already come apart at a seam at the top. This isn't even an area that takes a lot of wear and tear. But the real kicker is that after 1 month you can't return it to Amazon. Jansport covers it in their warranty, but you have to pay the return shipping. This is a heavy pack so shipping is going to run pretty high. I am not happy at all about this and would not recommend this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Storage capacity could have been better but overall it was well made and a good value
customer_reviews.author: Hank F

customer_reviews.title: Big help.
customer_reviews.text: We had a situation and need a super good rolling backpack. I met what we want: soft fabric, light weight, more spaces, smooth rolling. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: le nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Don't Carry What You Can Roll
customer_reviews.text: My Middle school aged grandson was loaded down like a mule with books,and computer. Jan Sport made his life better.
customer_reviews.author: george s. burnett

customer_reviews.title: We have a regular JanSport backpack and love it. It's super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have a regular JanSport backpack and love it. It's super sturdy, so I bought a roller backpack for my son in middle school. It is still high quality but the telescoping arm needs to be stronger. We returned one already because the arm broke within a month or two. Hoping the second one lasts but I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W. Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Product is not sturdy enough, got damaged in the first week of school
customer_reviews.text: The straps got ragged in the first week of class. They were not built to endure a 4th grade routine of going around with a full back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane O.

customer_reviews.title: This bag turned out to be a really good purchase. It's seems a strong bag and ideal ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag turned out to be a really good purchase. It's seems a strong bag and ideal for my 10yr old daughter. It is working great for her, she likes it. I'm happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Devaney Lake

customer_reviews.title: like it, but a few things things that are inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: The zippered sections are a little hard to open and there is no real good place to put files so they won't get damaged. The straps need to be "unhooked" to get them out of the way when using the rollers which is inconvenient when I need to quickly change from rolling mode to backpack mode which I do often when at the airport or when needing to board the plane.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cavalieri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the teacher with a bad back!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I found this bag! Costs twice as much on the jansport site. Background is more gray, which means people like me won’t get it filthy right away, lol
customer_reviews.author: A Jo

customer_reviews.title: These are HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my sons to use at school. On the FIRST day the straps BROKE & on the SECOND day the zipper broke! These are too expensive to fall apart like this in 2 days! I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Candace Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but arrived with a hole
customer_reviews.text: The backpack looks durable and has lots of storage space. I was disappointed that it arrived with a hole, though 😕 I didn’t want to return it and pay more for a replacement, so I’ll just deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be sturdy, well constructed, wheels and handle work well. It holds a lot of items. I bought this as a gift and the recipient is happy, uses it daily, nothing has broken after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My son is in prep for prep and needed a durable, roomy backpack with wheels to hold all of his very heavy school books! This backpack fit the bill! Wheels roll 360’. Plenty of room for a huge binder, 4 textbooks, 3 notebooks and a lunch bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Henry

customer_reviews.title: Handle breaks
customer_reviews.text: Lasted five months and the handle broke. Same thing happened with the last one. I guess I will try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Linbo

customer_reviews.title: planes, trains, & bus use
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to a spinner carry on. Used this as carry on from west coast to Japan. Besides the plane, it was used for train & bus travel and held up well. It has lots of compartments & a pouch for laptops. I especially like the single T handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for school with no lockers!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in 7th grade and they do not have lockers. She had to carry all of her books and her computer. She had a regular backpack to start school with, but she started to have back problems. We got her this one about 2 months ago and it has been great! She has not had any problems and it is FULL!! I would recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jaben00

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the second identical backpack of this type that I have owned. I drove the first one into the ground, but got a lot of use out of it. The backpack has many compartments and storage areas, and holds my laptop securely. I use it every day for work and travel by air a lot. It holds up really well for hours of airport travel (I use it as a carry-on). When I finally needed another one, I figured they probably didn't make this model anymore. I was very pleasantly surprised when I found out that it was still available. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Student approved
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for students with big books. I carry about 4 college textbooks plus my laptop and notebooks and there’s still room for my collection of pens and accessory items I use in school. I’m a dental hygiene student and I recommend this to all of my friends because of the lifetime warranty and the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Handle won’t extend after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this expensive bag in September this year. It is now just two months later and the telescoping handle will not fully extend today. I bought this bag for the rolling feature which was only works if the handle holds up. The window for returning is closed for this order. I’m very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Malisa

customer_reviews.title: I love my rolling backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love my rolling backpack. I got it because I’m having nerve issues with my left shoulder and since I have been using this bag, it is almost gone. Just as I remember from the Jansport backpack I had in high school, it made with the same quality fabric and well put together. It has lots of room; more than enough for me. I use it for work as I work between 2 places and need to carry things that I use in my office and may need in clinic. The only reason why I didn’t give it 5 stars was that there is only place for a water bottle. I would be very nice if it had 2.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dane

customer_reviews.title: The best wheeled backpack
customer_reviews.text: Jansport is a great brand and this bag is no exception. It fits the laptop, notebooks, books, anything. Yet, it doesn't look bulky and when you pull it, it feels like it has nothing inside. All the guys in the office asked me to place an amazon order for them (we live in Dubai)! Great product and it comes in many other nice colours. I wanted to buy the dark burgandy but it was out of stock when I placed the order.
customer_reviews.author: Salma Massoud

customer_reviews.title: Effortless movement
customer_reviews.text: You barely have to pull the handle for it to move no matter how heavy the load... great backpack
customer_reviews.author: Ladio

customer_reviews.title: Jansport wheeled backpack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack, it looked so good that even a thief wanted to steal it. I had to file a police report about the crime. It rolls really well, it has many places to put pens and pencils and many compartments to put papers and other things. I had loaded up this backpack with all my class books which were about 7 of thick textbooks for college. This backpack handled the load with ease. I do recommend this back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Foster L.

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Great product BUT The handle get locked before the month of use! I trusted in Samsonite quality but I fell disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: For an expensive brand name bag, this product didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: For an expensive brand name bag, this product didnt even make it a full year. The handle that allows my son to pull his back back pack ripped out. He now has a large back with wheels on it. Very unsatisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better rolling backpacks!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent! Supere my expectations. Im used to buy totto and pottery barn rolling backpacks. This in really big. Material very similar in quality as both brands I mentioned before. The wheels and the handle are very strog better than totto backpack. It has a lot of space fot school stuff and books. Also has an space that can be use for a laptop or a tablet. The price was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mmas_79

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: As described not bad quality for the price Very fast shipping thank you
customer_reviews.author: Daphyne

customer_reviews.title: straps drag on the ground
customer_reviews.text: We just received this bag. It seems great except for one huge design flaw. When you pull the bag, the backpack straps drag on the ground. My daughter wants to be able to pull the bag across the parking lot into school and then use it as a backpack when she wants. But it will damage or dirty the straps to have them dragging on the ground all the time like this. Am I not using it right?
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it, so far
customer_reviews.text: My son is a high school junior. He stuff his bag with huge books. He broke wheels on another bag in 3 months. So I searched for rolacement with large wheels. It's been 2 months, he has yet to break this one. So keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: This is been exactly what my fourth-grader needed! He can fit all of his books, notebooks, lunch bag and water bottle in this with no problem. Handle is great, rolls really well and I like that you have the option to carry on your back if it’s not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: H Powers

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: Great big rolling backpack. Works very easily! My grade school daughter loves it and can use for years!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bibey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tip over.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I don't have anything bad to say about it. It is the perfect size. It fits my 15 in laptop plus books. I really pack it full and it doesn't tip over. I hate that in a regular backpack. The wheels roll nicely. It has a large side compartment on the side that fits either 2 small bottles or one really large one. It is really durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 6th grade son. The zippers were VERY stiff and would get caught very easily. It was smaller than expected and could not hold his average size books (2 - 3) and binder. The "padded" lap top sleeve was suppose to hold a lap top up to 15" was too tight to hold our smaller than 15" lap top. All in all, too small and zippers not user friendly. I've always been impressed with the quality of Jansport but this particular item feel short.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Stop...do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this about 5 times and the handle does not retract. I have emailed the company and had NO response. I thought spending a little more would make this a quality product but I was wrong. DO NOTt purchase this item. Very bad customer service. No response at all. Now I am stuck with a useless item. You cannot put this in an overhead compartment on airplane due to the malfunction of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: ch

customer_reviews.title: Durable backpack and has held up well for the school ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable backpack and has held up well for the school year. My son complains about the water bottle compartment constantly because his thermos/ waterbottle always dislodges when he transports it in/out of the car. Could possibly get another year or two out of this, hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal mom

product_meta.title: JanSport Driver 8 Rolling Backpack - Wheeled Travel Bag with 15-Inch Laptop Sleeve
product_meta.description: For life on the move, this Jansport Driver 8 rolling backpack converts from backpack to roller with tuck-away shoulder straps. Jansport Driver 8 rolling backpack 80 mm inline skate wheels Front utility pocket with organizer Two large main compartments and one padded laptop sleeve Retractable two-stage handle Fully padded back panel Dimensions 21" x 14" x 10"/ 53 x 35 x 25 cm Laptop dimensions 11.5" x 10.5" x 1.5"/ 29 x 27 x 4 cm Fabric 600 denier polyester/ 420 denier nylon Imported
feature_bullets: THE MOST TRUSTED NAME IN BACKPACKS - Our belief in our packs is strong! Every JanSport comes with a lifetime warranty. Carry your JanSport with confidence, knowing we'll replace or repair any breaks
LIFE ON THE MOVE - The JanSport Driver 8 rolling backpack converts from backpack to roller with tuck-away shoulder straps
ORGANIZATION MADE EASY - This wheeled laptop backpack features a padded 15-inch laptop sleeve, side water bottle pocket, and front organizer pocket
RELIABLE BACKPACK - The Driver 8 durable construction is made to last; bag comes in a variety of colors to reflect your style & needs
AMERICAN TRADITION IN BACKPACKS – Generations have grown up & come to rely on this trusted brand. Over 50 years of schools, work, road trips, discovering fun, freedom & adventure

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
